pullRequest.title: DROOLS-5131: Extend coverage of boxed list expression
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR extends coverage of appending list expression entry

During this coverage extension a new issue was found https://issues.redhat.com/browse/KOGITO-1581
This PR serves also as reproducer for this new issue.

afterCommit.message:

This PR extends coverage of appending list expression entry

During this coverage extension a new issue was found https://issues.redhat.com/browse/KOGITO-1581
This PR serves also as reproducer for this new issue.

nodes.bodyText: You could be consistent with your use of final in this class.
It's not a "Decision table" in this test.
